channel.title: Alberto Monge Roffarello
channel.description: Personal website of Alberto Monge Roffarello, Assistant Professor (RTDb) at Politecnico di Torino

item.title: Participation at IS-EUD 2025: Two Papers on Digital Self-Control Tools and End-User Development
item.description: I'm presenting two papers at IS-EUD 2025 in Munich, Germany, both focusing on empowering end users to design their own digital self-control tools!

item.title: Participation at CHI 2025: Three Papers on AI Writing and Digital Wellbeing
item.description: Three papers I co-authored will be presented at CHI 2025 in Yokohama, Japan, covering AI-assisted writing and digital wellbeing research!
